content: using multiple stitches the turquoise lakes shawl pattern creates a beautiful tall open wave stitch pattern a video tutorial is available for this pattern on youtube https //youtu be/xmg5k7rqmmu stitches used single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet triple crochet dtr double triple crochet finished size 23 5 inches wide x 60 inches long
